---
name: Student-Facing Features
about: Track implementation of student-facing features for extracurricular activities platform
labels: enhancement
---

## Features
- Activity discovery
- Event listings
- Event details & registration
- User registration & login
- Personalization

### Description
Implement and improve the above features for students to discover, register, and personalize their experience with extracurricular activities.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Students can browse and filter activities
- Events are listed with details and registration options
- Registration and login flows are user-friendly
- Personalization options are available
